mention.text: the uta and the argentine federation of automotive passenger carriers
the few buses being driven by their owners
uta secretary general juan manuel palacios
a political infiltration of ideas that are not shared by all argentine people
those who want to work and who are sacrificing themselves for the benefit of the people
the cabinet meeting that started last night
a justicialist party communique signed by antonio caffiero
